ps_include_file

(PECL ps >= 1.3.4)

ps_include_file — Reads an external file with raw PostScript code

说明

ps_include_file ( resource $psdoc , string $file ) : bool

Warning

本函数还未编写文档，仅有参数列表。

参数

psdoc

Resource identifier of the postscript file as returned by ps_new().

file

返回值

成功时返回 TRUE， 或者在失败时返回 FALSE。
